summary: Provides an abstract base check for AWS CloudFormation security group resources that inspects inbound (ingress) rules and flags any rule that allows traffic from any source (e.g., 0.0.0.0/0 or ::/0). It integrates with the generic resourceâ€‘check framework and classifies the issue under network security.
business_intent: Enable automated detection of overly permissive security group configurations in CloudFormation templates so organizations can remediate potential exposure of services to the public internet and maintain compliance with security best practices.
